name: Peck Beach - Ludum Dare 46
description:
My Ludum Dare 46 submission! Unfortunately I missed the compo category submission limit and decided to post in the jam category anyways. 

This is a style of game I wanted to make for a long time.

All 3D models, sprites and most of the music/sfx were made by me in the jam time limit. I've put a lot of heart in it all, hope you like and don't forget to vote in the jam page.

Support for controller.

Keyboard commands:

MovementArrow keysJump/Confirm action[Z]Action/Confirm action[X]Go back[C]
